checkout-page.h1: Book bus tickets to Europe from Ukraine quickly and easily with GreenBus. A wide selection of routes, great prices, modern comfortable trips, and 24/7 support.
checkout-page.seat_selection_instruction: Click on available seats on floor {floor}.
checkout-page.still_online_description: Since you didn't complete the order in the allotted time, we cleared your cart.
checkout-page.book_within_2: to secure your spot and avoid potential price hikes later.
checkout-page.price_note: The price may change depending on carrier load. The final amount will be known upon payment confirmation.
checkout-page.deselect_seat: Deselect the selected seat to continue.
checkout-page.payment_confirm_error_description: An error occurred while confirming the payment
checkout-page.sms_confirmation_notice: An SMS confirmation is required to complete the booking
checkout-page.seat_unavailable_error: The selected seat is not available. Please choose another one.
checkout-page.seat_list_updated_description: Please choose new seats for the passengers
checkout-page.sms_code_error: An error occurred while verifying the code
checkout-page.sms_code_sent: Confirmation code sent to your phone
checkout-page.order_price_mismatch_error: The total order amount does not match the request amount
checkout-page.service_unavailable_desc: We‚Äôre working to restore it ‚Äî it will be back soon.
